com.topcoder.management.review
Interface ReviewPersistence

public interface ReviewPersistence

This interface defines the contract of managing the review entities in the persistence. It provides the persistence functionalities to create, update and search reviews. Additionally, application users can also add comment for review and item, and get all the comment types from the persistence. The constructor of the implementation must take a string argument as namespace.

Thread Safety: The implementation of this interface is not required to be thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
woodjhon, urtks

Method Detail

createReview

public void createReview(com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review review,
                         java.lang.String operator)
                  throws DuplicateReviewEntityException,
                         ReviewPersistenceException

Create the review in the persistence. This method is also responsible for creating the associated Comment, and Item, but not for CommentType.

Parameters:
review - the Review to create
operator - the operator who creates the review
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either of arguments is null, or operator is empty string or review fails to pass the validation.
DuplicateReviewEntityException - if review id already exists.
ReviewPersistenceException - if failed to create the instance in the persistence

updateReview

public void updateReview(com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review review,
                         java.lang.String operator)
                  throws ReviewEntityNotFoundException,
                         ReviewPersistenceException

Update the review in the persistence. The update method is also responsible for creating, deleting, updating the associated Items.

Parameters:
review - the review to update
operator - the operator who updates the review
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either of arguments is null, operator is empty string, or review fails to pass the validation.
ReviewEntityNotFoundException - if given review id does not exist
ReviewPersistenceException - if any other error occurred.

getReview

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review getReview(long id)
                                                     throws ReviewEntityNotFoundException,
                                                            ReviewPersistenceException

Get the review with given review id from the persistence.

Parameters:
id - the review id
Returns:
the Review instance with given id
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is not positive
ReviewEntityNotFoundException - if given id does not exist in the database
ReviewPersistenceException - if any other error occurred.

searchReviews

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.Review[] searchReviews(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter,
                                                                  boolean complete)
                                                           throws ReviewPersistenceException

Search the reviews with given search filters. If complete is false, the associated items and comments of the matching review will not been retrieved. Return empty array if no review matches the filter.

In the version 1.0, the filter supports at most five fields:

  1. scorecardType --- the score card type, must be java.Long type
  2. submission --- the review submission id, must be java.Long type
  3. reviewer --- the author of the review, must be java.Long type
  4. project --- the project id of the review, must be java.Long type
  5. committed --- indicate if the review has been committed, must be java.lang.Integer type. Either new Integer(1) representing committed, or new Integer(0), represent not committed

Parameters:
filter - the filter that specifies the search conditions
complete - a boolean indicating if the complete review data is retrieved
Returns:
an array of matching reviews, possible empty.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null
ReviewPersistenceException - if failed to search the reviews.

addReviewComment

public void addReviewComment(long reviewId,
                             com.topcoder.management.review.data.Comment comment,
                             java.lang.String operator)
                      throws ReviewEntityNotFoundException,
                             ReviewPersistenceException

Add comment to review with given review id. this method is responsible for creating the Comment, but not for the CommentType of the given comment.

Parameters:
reviewId - the review id
comment - the Comment instance to add
operator - the operator who adds the comment
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if comment or operator is null, reviewId is not positive, operator is empty string.
ReviewEntityNotFoundException - if reviewId does not exists
ReviewPersistenceException - if any other error occurred.

Throws:

ReviewEntityNotFoundException - if itemId does not exists
ReviewPersistenceException - if any other error occurred.

getAllCommentTypes

public com.topcoder.management.review.data.CommentType[] getAllCommentTypes()
                                                                     throws ReviewPersistenceException

Get all the CommentType instances from the persistence. Return empty array if no type is found.

Returns:
An array containing all the CommentType instances
Throws:
ReviewPersistenceException - if failed to get the types
